thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Gail LeBlanc
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Gail LeBlanc

author: Gail LeBlanc
title: Gail LeBlanc
text:
I ordered two wallets before Christmas and expected about two months for delivery, as it was coming from Chine. When the wallets did not arrive I sent an email to Customer Service and they responded the next day. There was no hassle or haggling - they simply reshipped the wallets.
I really appreciate the excellent service. It has taken away any apprehension about ordering from overseas!!
Breezy (Gail LeBlanc)
